text:
It's clear students at @DELNORTEHS are keeping up with the news. They asked about the #TransMilitaryBan.

I was eager to share my work to #ProtectTransTroops on @HASCDemocrats because anyone who has volunteered to serve our country & meets requirements should be able to serve.

html: Lost wages just because women make less than men doing the same jobs means the difference between several months rent each year or some trips to the grocery store each month. Can you imagine the impact that has for a single mom without any other income stream? #EqualPayDay
text: Lost wages just because women make less than men doing the same jobs means the difference between several months rent each year or some trips to the grocery store each month. Can you imagine the impact that has for a single mom without any other income stream? #EqualPayDay

html: “Imagine a workplace where women don’t have to spend any energy fighting for fair pay and equal rights, and instead can put that energy into their work...this is the moment.” ~Michelle Williams #EqualPayDay #PaycheckFairnessActpic.twitter.com/aERFJgK1aF
text: “Imagine a workplace where women don’t have to spend any energy fighting for fair pay and equal rights, and instead can put that energy into their work...this is the moment.” ~Michelle Williams  #EqualPayDay #PaycheckFairnessActpic.twitter.com/aERFJgK1aF

html: It's #EqualPayDay, that day when women’s wages catch up to what men were paid in the previous year. I am proud to support HR 7, the #PaycheckFairness Act to change this reality.
